resources.string: Application created for an engineering thesis

"The software allows you to use a convolutional neural network to recognize a plant species by its fruit or flower.The total number of supported classes is 135 and the accuracy of the network is about 99%. "

To use the application, press the START button in the menu and then the TAKE PHOTO! button and take a picture of the flower or fruit. After the photo is loaded correctly, the results of the neural network will appear below it.
